22965.「やい お前っ！\n なぁんで こんな所で 寝てやがるっ！！:
Hey, you!
What're you doing, sleeping in a place like
this?!

22966.「あとちょっとで 狙ってた素材を\n 奪えるとこだったのに！\n お前のせいで:
I was so close to getting the ingredient I was
after! It's your fault it got away!!

22968.「……ひっでえ ツラしてやがんな。\n まるで この世の終わりでも\n 見てきた:
You've got an awful look on your face.
Like you just saw the end of the world...

22969.「はあ？\n エテーネの村が 大変だって！？:
What's that?
You're saying Ethene Village is in trouble?!

22971.「お前 海から流れ着いた 流れモンだな？\n にしちゃあ こんな海から離れた所で:
You must've drifted here from across the sea,
huh? Although if so, it's odd that I found you
lying so far from the ocean...

22972.「ここは 絶海の 小さな孤島だ。\n あるのは ナルビアって町が ひとつっきりで:
This is a small, isolated island in the middle
of the sea. There's only one town here,
Nalbia. I've never heard of Ethene Village.

22973.「起きられるんなら すぐそこの\n ナルビアの町に行きな。流れモンだからって\n:
If you can stand, head for the town of Nalbia
nearby. Don't worry, it's not a place where
they'd act cold just because you're a nobody.

22974.「今度 ジャマしたら タダじゃおかねえぞ！:
If you ever get in my way again, you won't get
off so easy!

22979.「んんっ？ 誰だ お前！？: Huh? And just who are you?!

22980.「お前は…… 外で転がってた 流れモンだな？\n 勝手に オレの家に 上がり込ん:
You're...that nobody I found lying around
outdoors, aren't you? What do you think you're
doing barging into my house?!

22981.「……なるほど。その釜に 興味を持ったのか。\n どこのウマのホネとも 知れねえ:
...I see. So you're interested in that pot?
Well, I don't know where you're from, but
you've certainly got a good eye!

22982.「その釜は 我が家に伝わる 錬金釜だ。\n 錬金術を使うためには 欠かせない\n:
That's our family's traditional Alchemy Pot.
It's a magic pot that's indispensable for
alchemy. It's more important than my own life!

22983.「そして その錬金釜こそが 錬金術師の証！\n つまり このオレこそが 選ばれし:
And that Alchemy Pot is the mark of an
alchemist! In other words, I'm one of the
chosen few... Alchemists are rare nowadays!

22984.「……あぁん？ なんだって？\n 錬金なら自分もできるって 言ったか？:
...Huh? What's that?
You say you can perform alchemy too?

22985.「テキトーなこと 抜かすんじゃねえ！\n なら 証拠に 上やくそうを錬金してみや:
Stop talking nonsense! Then why don't you try
alchemizing Strong Medicine as proof?! You at
least know the recipe for that, don't you?

22987.「まさか 上やくそうのレシピも 知らねえのか？\n そんなんで よくも 錬金でき:
Don't tell me you don't know the recipe for
Strong Medicine? How dare you call yourself an
alchemist if you don't even know that?!

22990.<kyodai>は\n初級錬金学入門を 手に入れた！<me 60>:
<kyodai> received The Beginner's Guide to
Alchemy!<me 60>

22992.「さあ オレの錬金釜で\n 上やくそうを 錬金してみろ！\n 本当に やれるもん:
Go ahead, try to alchemize some Strong
Medicine in my Alchemy Pot! If you can do it,
then do it!

22993.「できた……！？\n そんな まさか……。:
You did it...?!
There's no way...

22994.「す…すげえじゃねえか！\n なんで お前に 錬金ができるんだ！？:
I...incredible!
How are you capable of performing alchemy?!

22995.「はぁ？ 今まで 箱で錬金してたって？\n 箱に魔力が宿るなんて 聞いたこともね:
Huh? You've been alchemizing with a box? I've
never heard of a box with magical powers. To
think you can use alchemy with just that...

22997.「オレも すこし前までは この釜を使って\n なんでも 錬金できたんだ。それが…:
I used to be able to use this pot to alchemize
anything I wanted. Then, one day... I suddenly
couldn't do it anymore.

22998.「釜が ぶっこわれたせいだと思い込んでいたが\n おかしくなったのは…… 釜じゃ:
At first I thought something was wrong with
the pot, but it wasn't the pot that was
broken, it was me.

22999.「おい ウマのホネ！\n お前に 頼みがある！:
Hey, nobody!
I need you to do something for me!

23000.「メラゾ熱にかかって 死にかけてる オレの娘\n ……リリオルを 治すクスリを\:
My daughter, Lyriol, is dying of Kafrizz
Fever. I need you to alchemize a cure for her!

23003.<kyodai>は\nメラゾ熱のクスリの本を 手に入れた！<me 60>:
<kyodai> received the Kafrizz Fever
Medicine Recipe!<me 60>

23004.「メラゾ熱ってのは 大昔の 恐ろしい病気だ。\n オレが 素材集めなんか手伝わせ:
Kafrizz Fever is a horrible disease from long
ago. I got Lyriol into this mess because I
asked her to gather materials for me...

23005.「頼む！ オレに代わってクスリを錬金してくれ！\n 材料の めざめの花と レッド:
Please! Alchemize the cure in my place! The
ingredients, Wakerobin and Buzzberries, are
both easy to find nearby!

23016.「や…… やってくれたか！\n すげえぞ ウマのホネ！:
Y...you did it!
That's amazing, nobody!

23017.「さあ そのクスリを オレにくれ！\n すぐに リリオルに飲ませよう！:
Come on, give me that cure!
I'll have Lyriol take it right away!

23020.<kyodai>は イッショウに\nメラゾ熱のクスリを 渡した！:
<kyodai> gave Issho the Kafrizz Fever
Medicine!

23023.「リリオル クスリだぞ。\n さあ 飲め。:
Lyriol, I've brought medicine.
Come on, drink.

23025.「……呼吸が すこし おだやかになってきた。\n さっそく クスリが効いたんだな:
...Her breathing is a little more relaxed now.
Seems like the cure's already taking effect.

23030.「お前は 娘の命を救ってくれた 恩人だ。\n これからは ウマのホネだなんて\n:
You saved my daughter's life.
After this, I can't keep calling you something
rude like "nobody", can I...?

23031.「……よし！\n これから お前のことは\n 宿ナシと 呼ばせてもらうぜ！:
...Alright, then it's settled! From now on,
I'll call you "hobo" instead!

23032.「たいした もてなしは できないが\n クスリを作ってもらった 礼がしたい。\n:
I can't offer much by way of hospitality, but
I'd like to thank you for making that cure.
Please, stay at our house tonight.

23034.<center>リリオルの病状は 目に見えて 落ち着いてゆき\nイッショウと <:
Lyriol's condition was visibly improving, and
eventually Issho and <kyodai> fell asleep
too.

23036.「おい 宿ナシ！ 起きてくれ！\n メラゾ熱のクスリが効いて\n リリオルが 元:
Hey, hobo! Wake up!
Lyriol's feeling better now that the Kafrizz
Fever Medicine has kicked in!

23037.「お前のおかげだ。\n なんと 礼を言っていいか……。:
This is all thanks to you.
I don't know how I can ever repay you...

23038.「ぜひ リリオルにも あいさつしてやってくれ。: Please say hi to Lyriol for me.

23039.「父から 聞きました。\n あなたが 私のクスリを 作ってくれたと……。:
I heard from my father. He said that you were
the one who made the cure for me...

23040.「クスリがなかったら 私は あと数日のうちに\n 命を 落としていたそうです。\:
If it weren't for that medication, I'd have
been dead in a matter of days. Thank you for
saving my life.

23041.「お前が いてくれて 本当に助かった。\n もし リリオルまで失うことになったら:
I'm so grateful that you're here. If I had
lost Lyriol too...I don't know what I would
have done.

23042.「なあ 宿ナシ。\n お前 いったい どこから来た？\n どうして あんな所で:
Hey, hobo.
Where'd you come from? Why were you lying out
there in the first place?

23043.<kyodai>は 故郷の エテーネの村が襲われ\n気づいたら この島にいたこと:
<kyodai> explained how they had found
themselves on this island after their home
village of Ethene was attacked.

23045.「<kyodai>って エテーネの人なの？\n 私 エテーネの村のことを 知って:
<kyodai>, you're from Ethene?
I know about that place!

23046.「ほら これを見て！\n すこし前に拾った ボトルレターなの。:
Take a look!
This is a letter in a bottle I found not too
long ago.

23047.「ボトルレター……？\n そういや前に 海で 手紙が入ったビンを\n 拾ったとか:
Letter in a bottle...? Well, I do remember you
saying something about finding a bottle that
washed in from the sea with a letter in it.

23049.「いつか このエテーネの村で\n いちばん幸せな カップルになろうね……って。:
"One day, we'll be the happiest couple in
Ethene Village."

23050.「う～ん 確かに 書いてあるかもしれねえが\n それだけの内容じゃ エテーネの村:
Hmmm... If the letter's that short, we won't
be able to find where Ethene Village actually
is, though.

23051.「でも きっと そんなに遠くないよ！\n だって このビンが 割れないで\n 流:
But it can't be that far, since this bottle
washed ashore without breaking!

23052.「ねえ <kyodai>。うちで暮らしなよ！\n エテーネの村の場所が わかるま:
Hey, <kyodai>. Live here with us!
You can stay at our house until you find out
where Ethene Village is～

23053.「……はあ？\n てめえ 勝手に決めてんじゃねえ！\n この家の主は オレだ！:
...Huh?
Don't just decide that on your own!
I'm the owner of this house!

23054.「お父さんは もう錬金できないんでしょ？\n なら <kyodai>が代わりに:
But you can't use alchemy anymore, can you?
So it'd be better for everyone if
<kyodai> used the Alchemy Pot instead!

23055.「て…… てめえっ リリオル！\n 元気になったとたん 言いたい放題だな。\n:
B...blast it, Lyriol! Now that you're better,
you think you can say whatever you want! You
brat!

23056.「そういうわけで お父さんのことは\n 気にしなくていいから よろしくね！\n:
So don't worry about my father.
We're happy to have you here, <kyodai>!

23057.「くっそう！\n よくも そこまで オレを無視して\n 話を 進められるもんだな:
Darn it!
Don't just ignore me and go on talking!

23058.「……おもしろくねえが しょうがねえ！\n うちに 置いてやってもいいが ちゃん:
...I don't like it, but it can't be helped!
If you're staying here, then you answer to me!
Got it, hobo?!

23059.「……いや 待てよ。\n 住む家が 決まっちまったとなると\n お前のこと もう:
...No, wait.
If you're living here now, I can't call you
"hobo" anymore...

23060.「……よし！\n これから お前のことは\n イソーローと 呼ばせてもらうぜ！:
...Right!
From now on, I'll call you freeloader!

23061.「ありがとう お父さん！\n お父さんなら きっと\n 賛成してくれると思ったわ:
Thanks, dad!
I knew you'd see it my way. <heart>

23062.「やい イソーロー！ オレの錬金釜を\n 使わせてやるんだから キビキビ はたら:
Hey, freeloader! I'm letting you use my
Alchemy Pot, so you'd better work hard!
I won't stand for slacking!

23063.「この町で 錬金に はげんでりゃあ\n いずれ 故郷に帰るための手掛かりが\n:
If you keep working on alchemy in this town,
there'll come a day when you'll find a clue
that'll lead you home! I've got a gut feeling!

23064.「よかったわね <kyodai>。\n 故郷に帰れるように 私も 応援するからね:
That's great, <kyodai>.
I'll be rooting for you to find your way home!

23079.「では さっそく アバさまに\n この豆を お見せしてこよう。\n ……そなたは:
Well then, I'll show this bean to Abba.
...You should wait here.

23080.「ア…… アバさまっ！ 大丈夫ですか？\n しっかりなさってください！:
A...Abba! Are you okay?
Stay with me, please!

23081.「カメさまの お告げの 救世主が\n あの ふしぎな豆の本をもとに\n このよう:
The savior the Galapogod spoke of has created
this based on the instructions in the
Mysterious Bean Book!

23085.「なっ なんじゃ この豆！？\n めちゃくちゃ うまいでは ないかっ！！:
What's with this bean?!
It's delicious!!

23086.「もぐもが もぐもぐ……。\n じゅるっ…… もがっ まめっ うまっ！！:
Munch, crunch, munch, munch...
Slurp... Seriously, (crunch) this is great!!

23088.「ぶっはぁっ！ うまかったあ！\n チカラが みなぎってきたわい！:
Aah! That was great!
Now I've got all the energy I need!

23089.「見ておれ……！\n 今の わしにかかれば これしきの儀式\n またたく間に 終:
Watch this...!
As I am now, I'll finish the ritual in no
time!

23090.「なんだったのだ あれは……？\n あれが…… あの豆の チカラなのか！？:
What on earth was that about...?
Is this...the power of that bean?!

23093.「<kyodai>だな？\n そなたのおかげだ。礼を言うぞ。:
You're <kyodai>, right?
This is all thanks to you. I appreciate it.

23097.「カメさまの お告げにありし 救世主のチカラで\n 長きに渡った 継承の儀式は終:
The Galapogod has spoken!
With the savior's power, the long-awaited rite
of succession has been completed!

23098.「さあ！ 新たなる巫女を 皆で迎えるのじゃ！！: Now! Let us all welcome the new priestess!!

23099.「おおっ…… 新たなる巫女さま バンザイっ！\n アバさま バンザイっ！！:
Ohh...! All hail the new priestess!
All hail Abba!!

23100.「わが名は アバ！\n 新たなる巫女として エテーネの民を\n 導く者なり！！:
My name is Abba!
I am the new priestess who will lead the
people of Ethene!

23101.「わしは 巫女として\n エテーネの民たちに 新しき道を 示そう！:
As priestess, I will bring the people of
Ethene down a new path!

23102.「この豆 めちゃくちゃ うまい！\n 皆で このふしぎな豆を 育てるのじゃ！！:
These beans are so tasty!
Together, we'll grow more of these magical
beans!!

23103.「なんと！ 見たこともない豆じゃ。:
What?
I've never seen a bean like that before.

23104.「このふしぎな豆は わしに チカラを与え\n 儀式の最後のカベを 越えさせてくれ:
This mysterious bean gave me the strength to
cross the final threshold of the ritual.
These beans...

23105.「ハツラツ豆と 名付ける！: I'm gonna call them Pep Beans!

23106.「ハツラツ豆……？\n あの豆が アバさまを 救ってくれたのか！？:
Pep Beans...?
That bean saved Abba's life?!

23107.「ありがたい豆なんだねえ。\n この地でも たくさん収穫できるよう\n 皆で 大:
Thank goodness for that bean.
Let's take good care of it so we can harvest
lots of them here!

23108.「ふっふっふっ。これで ハツラツ豆が\n いつでも 食べられるようになるわい。:
Heheheh. Now I can eat those beans whenever I
want.

23109.「アバ！\n 大事な話を 忘れておるじゃろう。\n <kyodai>のことを 皆:
Abba! You're forgetting something important.
You need to explain to everyone who
<kyodai> is!

23111.「皆に 紹介しよう！\n この ハツラツ豆を作ってくれたのが\n ここにいる <:
Allow me to introduce you all!
This is <kyodai>, the person who made
that bean.

23112.「カメさまの お告げの通り\n わしが 新たなる巫女となるために\n チカラを尽:
As the Galapogod instructed me, I did
everything in my power to become the new
priestess!

23113.「わしは 村の救世主 <kyodai>に敬意を表し\n エテーネの民のひとりとし:
I've decided to honor the savior of the
village, <kyodai>, and welcome them as
one of our own. Treat them kindly, everyone!

23115.「ふう……。\n これで わしも 肩の荷が下りたわい……。:
Phew...
I'm happy to have that burden off my
shoulders...

37759.「ゴルルルゥ。におう……におうぞォ！\n こいつは 錬金術師の においだなァ！？:
Grrrr. This...this smell!
This is the smell of an alchemist, isn't it?!

37760.「オレ様を こんなほこらに\n 閉じ込めやがった 錬金術師ィ！\n ゆるさん……:
The alchemist who locked me in this shrine!
Unforgivable... UNFORGIVABLE!!

37761.「我は この世を絶望で満たすために\n はるか死の世界より 訪れし者……。:
I've come from a far-off world of death to
fill this one with despair...

37762.「せっかく ひとりの 有能な錬金術師から\n その能力を消し去ったというのに す:
Just when I'd erased the ability from one
skilled alchemist, another appears in his
place...

37763.「貴様も あの錬金術師のように\n 我に 錬金術師としてのチカラを捧げよ！\n:
You, too, must give me your alchemical powers,
and taste the despair of death!

37764.「どうだい ボクのキンキラの身体。\n すっごい錬金術師が 作ってくれたんだよ。:
What do you think of my glittering body?
It was made for me by an amazing alchemist.

37765.「知ってるよ。キミも錬金術師なんだろ？\n ここまで来た人は 本当に ひさしぶり:
I know. You're an alchemist too, aren't you?
It's been a long time since anyone's come this
far. I'm so happy.

37766.「さあ キミのチカラを見せてほしいな。\n それが ボクのお仕事なんだ。\n ほ:
Now, show me your power.
That's my job, after all.
Look out, here I come, here I come～!!

37767.「おお……。ついに 我が前に現れたか。\n セルゲイナスの呪いすら 退ける\n:
Ohh...! So you've appeared before me at last,
a person with unparalleled alchemical skill
who even dispelled Bilhaw's curse.

37768.「私の名は バルザック。\n 究極と呼ばれる錬金術…… とある秘法により\n 自:
My name is Baalzack. I am the ultimate
alchemist...a genius who transformed even his
own body with an arcane technique.

37769.「私は これまで 多くの錬金術師を食らい\n その知識と技術を この身に宿してき:
I have devoured many alchemists and imbued
their knowledge and skills into my body.

37770.「だが 食らうだけの価値がある\n チカラを持った錬金術師は なかなか現れぬ。\:
But alchemists skilled enough to make a worthy
meal are hard to come by. That's why I decided
to raise them myself.

37771.「ククク……。この地にある ほこらはな\n 未熟な錬金術師に チカラをつけさせる:
Gweh heh heh... The shrines in this area are a
giant "Alchemy Pot" I created to train
inexperienced alchemists.

37772.「そうとも知らず 貴様は\n 錬金術師としての ウデをみがき続け\n こうして:
Knowing nothing of this, you continued to hone
your skills as an alchemist, and now you
appear before me!

37773.「残念だが このほこらの先に\n 行かせるわけにはいかん！ 貴様は ここで\n:
Unfortunately for you, I can't allow you to
pass this shrine! Here, you will become part
of my power!

37774.「ふたたび 来るとは思わなかったぞ。\n だが 残念ながら このほこらの先に\n:
I didn't expect you to return. But
unfortunately for you, I can't allow you to
pass this shrine!

37775.「貴様が 私を倒し このほこらの先に\n 行くことは 不可能だ！ この身体こそ\:
Defeating me and reaching the end of this
shrine is impossible! My body is a masterpiece
of alchemy!

37776.「今度こそ 貴様を食わせてもらうぞ！\n 私が 究極の錬金術師となるためにな！:
This time, I'll devour you!
Then I'll become the ultimate alchemist!

41008.「メラゾ熱のクスリを 作って\n どうか リリオルの命を救ってやってくれ！！:
Please make Kafrizz Fever Medicine and save
Lyriol's life!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

41009.イッショウは リリオルに\nメラゾ熱のクスリを 飲ませた！: Issho gave Lyriol the Kafrizz Fever Medicine!

146741.「<kyodai>。わしには わかっておるぞ。\n お前は 時渡りの術により\n:
<kyodai>, I know. You came to this time
through the art of time travel, didn't you?

146742.「……何も言わんでよい。\n このことは お前と わしの\n ふたりだけの 秘密:
...I won't tell anyone.
It'll be our little secret.

146743.「時渡りは とうの昔に 忘れ去られた術。\n ふたたび 人々が クチにするように:
The art of time travel has been lost for so
long. If people start talking about it again,
it'll be easy for the bad guys to find you.

146744.「……そう。今 この時代に\n 時渡りの術を使える者は おらん。\n お前が 元:
...That's right. You're the only one in this
age who can use the art of time travel.
There's no way for you to return to your time.

146746.「会うことは かなわぬとも\n 我が祈りにより せめて お前の思いを\n <pc:
Even if you'll never see them again, you can
at least send your thoughts to <pc>
through prayer.
